document.full_text: dna tests on the body of osama bin laden showed a virtual 100 percent match to relatives, and a woman believed to be his wife also identified him by name, a senior u.s. intelligence official told reporters on monday.
document.title: dna test on bin laden show 100 percent match to family
lines_and_colors: dna tests on the body of osama bin laden showed a virtual 100 percent match to relatives, and a woman believed to be his wife also identified him by name, a senior u.s. intelligence official told reporters on monday.
